description.lang: The Environmental Sensor (SES 302) measures temperature. The sensor is battery-operated devices which transmit information to an associated device in a network. It can support either 1 thermistor (SES 001) or up to 4 external digital temperature sensors (SES 002/003). SES 302 operates on 2x AA batteries, providing a nominal life of 2 years (with on-board sensors operating with the default configuration).
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, in which multilevel sensor report, Battery low alarm are reported.Each endpoint supports 1 association group.

This Parameter is used to configure the delta based temperature report.To configure Delta temperature reporting to 2 C. The value need to configured in device is 2/0.1 = 20.Controllers may only allow configuring signed values. In order to set values in the range 128255, the value sent in the application shall be equal to desired value minus 256. For example, to set Delta Temperature to 130, it may be needed to set a value 130256=126.

This Parameter is used to configure the time interval based temperature report.Controllers may only allow configuring signed values. In order to set values in the range 128255, the value sent in the application shall be equal to desired value minus 256. For example, to set Delta Temperature to 130, it may be needed to set a value 130256=126.
